basic.Peptide Name: Hs02 (predicted AMPs, encrypted AMPs, cryptide, XXA, UCLL1c; more predicted)
basic.Source: predicted from the human unconventional myosin 1H protein, intragenic antimicrobial peptide,Homo sapiens, primates, mammals, animals
basic.Target Organism: Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 and 4 strains (MIC 1-2 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 and 8 strains (MIC 1.67-8.2 uM), S. aureus ATCC 25923 and 3 strains (MIC 1-4.1 uM), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 2-8.2 uM). In a different paper,it is showed to be active against S. epidermidis (MIC 1 uM), T. rubrum (MIC 8 uM), and C. albicans (MIC 1.67 uM).
